content.en: Reachability analysis: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to address different research questions related to reachability analysis in scientific abstracts. These algorithms are being used to develop methods for approximating reachability computation, performing fast and efficient reachability analysis, generating reachability information, characterizing reachable sets, and performing rigorous reachability analysis. They are also being utilized to compute over-approximations of reachable sets, perform quantitative local analysis, analyze the reachability of uncertain hybrid systems, compute bounded time reachable sets, estimate forward reachable sets, and investigate the reachability of dimension-bounded linear systems.
content.da: Nåbarhedsanalyse: Forskere har udforsket forskellige algoritmer for at tackle forskellige forskningsspørgsmål relateret til nåbarhedsanalyse i videnskabelige abstracts. Disse algoritmer bliver brugt til at udvikle metoder til at tilnærme nåbarhedsberegninger, udføre hurtig og effektiv nåbarhedsanalyse, generere nåbarhedsinformation, karakterisere nåbare sæt og udføre stringente nåbarhedsanalyser. De bliver også anvendt til at beregne over-tilnærmelser af nåbare sæt, udføre kvantitativ lokal analyse, analysere nåbarheden af usikre hybride systemer, beregne tidsbegrænsede nåbare sæt, estimere fremadrettede nåbare sæt og undersøge nåbarheden af dimensionsbegrænsede lineære systemer.
